name: Crazy Platez
description:
Your responsibility as a Crazy Platez delivery driver is to keep the people of Rochester, NY satisfied and full!

Race against the clock to deliver plates, refill your tank before you run out of gas, and compete for the top spot on the leaderboards! For every delivery, collect tips to spend on new cars.

Features:
- Original soundtrack
- Rochester-inspired map
- Achievements
- Leaderboards
- Lots of unlockable cars
- No ads

Crazy Platez is developed and published by Aesthetician Labs, LLC, with support from Rochester Institute of Technology's MAGIC Spell Studios, LLC.

Crazy Platez won first place in the student category of the 2018 New York State Game Dev Challenge.
